# General Settings

Supervertaler settings control application behavior, providers, and UI preferences.

## Where to find settings

Open the **Settings** tab in the app.

## Common items

- LLM provider configuration (API keys, models)
- Default languages
- Autosave and project options
- Feature toggles (depending on your setup)
